          <title>
            <string language="fr">Différents sens de croissance des pousses des plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Different growth directions of the shoots of plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Wachstumrichtungen der 
Eintragfäden der Betriebe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentidos diferentes do crescimento dos tiros das

            <string language="x-mt-it">Sensi differenti di sviluppo dei germogli di

lanzamientos de plantas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme compare trois différents sens de croissance des pousses de trois plantes.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares three different growth directions of the shoots of three plants.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara três sentidos diferentes do
